name: Jan VI de Oude
origin: Jan was born into the noble House of Nassau.
story: Jan was the second child and inherited the family’s estate in Germany. Jan had a short career as the stadtholder of Gelre. He then was summoned by his brother Willem to supervise the Union of Utrecht formation. This treaty united the northern provinces in the Netherlands against the Spanish influence. The Union was signed in the kapittel hall in the Academy Building.

name: The Oracle
